quest.name: Digestive Problems
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Zeuxis needs a helping hand of steel.
objectives: Deliver the noxious fruit to Zeuxis.

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: Hm, I don't know whose familiar you are, but won't you lend me a hand?

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: A plant creation has recently dropped its fruit, and I'd be grateful if you could gather a few samples for me. You should find some along the northern edge of this isle. Large as they are, you won't mistake them.

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: Be warned, however, that the fruit are covered in an acidic secretion. Before you handle any, you'll want to apply this steelskin balm on your hands.

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: Remember, the fruits are covered in an acidic secretion. Before you handle any, you'll want to apply the steelskin balm on your hand.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You liberally apply the steelskin balm to your hands.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Creations lie prone near the fruit, alive but insensate...

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: Ah, you're back. Were you able to get the fruit?

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: Oho, such marvelous specimens! My thanks!

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: You appear none the worse for the wear either, so you must have used the balm like I suggested. Very good, very good.

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: You may be wondering why the fruit is covered in acid. One day, each fruit will become a carnivorous plant that preys on herbivores, keeping their population in check.

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: But until it matures, it needs protection from those selfsame herbivores. To that end, we tried giving the mother plant the impulse to spray its fruit with its digestive secretion.

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: The fruit you brought, we will examine to determine its resistance to the acid, and make adjustments as necessary. My thanks for your help!

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: ...Hm? You're looking a bit unwell. You must've gotten the secretion on you, you poor thing. We'd best treat you at once.

dialogue.name: ZEUXIS
dialogue.text: There, you'll be fine now. You did well to endure the pain, but you should've used the balm. Remember to do so next time, all right?
